ygData.subject: Unsubscribe
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From:  To:  Sent: Saturday, June 19, 1999 4:15 AM Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Digest Number 45
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 19, 1999 4:15 AM
Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Digest Number 45


>
> What do lizards and rock music have in common?
> http://www.onelist.com
> They both have communities at ONElist. Find yours today!
>
> There are 9 messages in this issue.
>
> Topics in today's digest:
>
> 1. Re: new shadow knight here
> From: "Remlin" <remlin@...>
> 2. on switching servers for a guild
> From: kith@...
> 3. Re: new shadow knight here
> From: Xillith ofNeriak <xillith@...>
> 4. Re: new shadow knight here
> From: Xillith ofNeriak <xillith@...>
> 5. Re: on switching servers for a guild
> From: Xillith ofNeriak <xillith@...>
> 6. Re: on switching servers for a guild
> From: "Spirit" <spirit@...>
> 7. Re: on switching servers for a guild
> From: "Jeremy" <Jeremy@...>
> 8. Re: on switching servers for a guild
> From: <pwolf@...>
> 9. Re: on switching servers for a guild
> From: "Jeremy" <spirit@...>
>
>
>
____________________________________________________________________________
___
>
____________________________________________________________________________
___
>
> Message: 1
> Date: Fri, 18 Jun 1999 06:11:58 -0000
> From: "Remlin" <remlin@...>
> Subject: Re: new shadow knight here
>
> U Sneeky Bastard!
>
> May the Darkness Protect You From the Evils that Lurk in the Sun
>
> Remlin Ryal, Warlord of House Ryal
> <lvl 13, SK, Rallos Zek>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jeremy <Jeremy@...>
> To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
> Date: Thursday, June 17, 1999 9:23 PM
> Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] new shadow knight here
>
>
> >From: "Jeremy" <Jeremy@...>
> >
> >A halberd will fit in a large sewing kit
> >
> >----- Original Message -----
> >From: Xillith ofNeriak <xillith@...>
> >To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
> >Sent: Thursday, June 17, 1999 2:42 PM
> >Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] new shadow knight here
> >
> >
> >> From: Xillith ofNeriak <xillith@...>
> >>
> >> Hi!
> >>
> >> I hear there is a merchant in the Oasis of Marr that sells combine
> >weapons,
> >> but I have no idea how much. I have the (Lore) Shiny Brass Haldbred
that
> >> was dropped by the named orc in High Hold, dmg 16, not sure of speed.
I
> >do
> >> not use it much unless running with my sisters because I cannot bag the
> >> weapon and it makes me a walking shooting gallery. Sometimes powerfull
> >> charecters sell Rune Totem Staves, I used to have one. Now I realise
> that
> >a
> >> stick is not very Knight like, but no one complains when you are the
only
> >> tank beating back the ghoul in Befallen. I didn't actually start
> >collecting
> >> magic weapons as loot untill I was 17th level. That may be because we
> >> didn't know where to go or just refused to brave the goody lands and
risk
> >> attack. At your level, all you can do is save your snake fangs and buy
> >one.
> >>
> >> ~Xillith.
> >>
> >> HEY, is anyone aware of a container that will fit a haldbred? Shiny
> Brass
> >> is useless to me if I cannot bag it with all the scrapes I get into.
> >>
> >> Thanks.
> >>
> >>
> >>
> >>
> >> >From: "Psion" <psionprime@...>
> >> >Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
> >> >To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
> >> >Subject: [eq_shadowknights] new shadow knight here
> >> >Date: Wed, 16 Jun 1999 19:35:54 -0400
> >> >
> >> >From: "Psion" <psionprime@...>
> >> >
> >> >Hello all. I occasionally take a break from my magi to play a sk on
> >Xegony.
> >> >I was wondering what would be a nice 2H magic weapon to quest for, for
a
> >> >first magic weapon. I'm not asking for any real spoilers, perhaps
> someone
> >> >could point me in the right direction ?
> >> >
> >> >My troll is level 8 at the moment and had saved enough plat to by a
> >regular
> >> >steel halberd at 36p. I've been told a few time that was monumentously
> >> >stupid, but heh what can I say, troll's ain't rose that far out of the
> >> >swamp ) Anyway, having only played a magi I'm not used to dealing with
> >> >weapons and such, so what would be nice to have ? what are some price
> >> >ranges
> >> >to save for, etc ? Any help/thoughts on the subject would be cool, and
> my
> >> >thanks to you.
> >> >
> >> >Bumzuk of Grobb
> >> >
> >> >
> >>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
> >> >ONElist: where real people with real interests get connected.
> >> >http://www.onelist.com
> >> >Join a new list today!
> >>
> >>
> >> _______________________________________________________________
> >> Get Free Email and Do More On The Web. Visit http://www.msn.com
> >>
>
>> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> >> Where do some of the Internet's largest email lists reside?
> >> http://www.onelist.com
> >> At ONElist - the most scalable and reliable service on the Internet.
> >
> >
> >------------------------------------------------------------------------
> >How many communities do you think join ONElist each week?
> >http://www.onelist.com
> >More than 5,000! Create yours now!
>
>

> Message: 2
> Date: 18 Jun 1999 14:00:22 -0000
> From: kith@...
> Subject: on switching servers for a guild
>
> Greetings Shadowknights,
>
> I'm fairly sure that once a guild is approved, it can be set on any or
> all servers, but I was wondering how. Must you re-create the same
> character, and then talk to a GM? Or is is more complicated? Recently, I
> started a guild on Tunare with another character, and now I'd like to
> have it on Rallos Zek, because it is probably the greatest server for
> roleplaying, hands down. Any advice is appreciated!
> Thanks,
>
> Envy (tunare)
> Shadow Striders
>
> (aka- Sugan on Tunare and 'Zek)
>
>
>
____________________________________________________________________________
___
>
____________________________________________________________________________
___
>

> >

> >weapons,
> > >but I have no idea how much.
> >

> Message: 5
> Date: Fri, 18 Jun 1999 12:03:01 EDT
> From: Xillith ofNeriak <xillith@...>
> Subject: Re: on switching servers for a guild
>
> Well,
> I am aware of several guilds that have existed in other game settings,
> the Covetous Crew being one of them. I BELIEVE ( but I am not entirely
sure
> ) that "The Clan of the Lich" existed on another server before appearing
on
> Zek.
>
> Go to
> www.ralloszek.com
> and look up the guilds there. "Lich" is one of them and I recall from
> reading their charter that they were or still are on another server.
>
> Enjoy Rallos Zek, it's a blast.
>
> ~Xillith
>
>

> Message: 6
> Date: Fri, 18 Jun 1999 13:43:22 -0400
> From: "Spirit" <spirit@...>
> Subject: Re: on switching servers for a guild
>
> While we're on the subject of Guilds on Zek, I'm thinking(and am only in
the
> very beginning stages) of starting a guild of Necromancers and
Shadowknights
> only, and calling it (tentatively) the "Hand of Innoruuk".
> I'm currently thinking of allowing only Teir'Dal to become members(I've
> found that Human and even Gnomish and Erudite Necromancers and
Shadowknights
> cannot be trusted by us), but this could change.
>
> At any rate, if there's any interest, mail malvolin@....
Again,
> this is not something that'll be happening tomorrow, I'm just looking at
> interest.
>
> Malvolin(Teir'Dal Necromancer)
> Azalin(Human Shadowknight)
>
>

> Message: 8
> Date: Fri, 18 Jun 1999 12:57:07 -0700
> From: <pwolf@...>
> Subject: Re: on switching servers for a guild
>
>
> Evil Guilds
>
> Darkenbane controls the ogres and trolls
> Numerous Dark Elven guilds are about
>
> all of these guilds, however, are near freeport, the eastern part of the
> continent, or sometimes they travel in the middle, such as the Karanas
> perhaps.
>
> But their is none on the western side of the continent, to strike true
fear
> upon the many druids, rangers, barbarians, and erudites among this area.
> The few that exist in this area, are but mere kinslayers (also referred to
> as newbie killers), the antics of the Knights Of Terror, and a few of the
> Covetous Crew that wander around...
>
> I was hoping, perhaps one day, that one such would come to strike true
> fear. But more or less I was thinking, of Humans and Erudites to do this.
> What I had in mind, a followers of the Plaguebringer. Necromancers,
Knights
> of the shadows, Enchanters, Dark Clerics, Murderous Warriors, Wizards and
> Mages, all whom follow the Plaguebringer, to form an alliance. Perhaps
this
> could be the player side of the Bloodsabers. I was also thinking of
letting
> the Erudite Necromancers to be a part of this as well, since they are far
> from evil civilization, and it is difficult for them to travel alone.
>
> Perhaps a great intro for this guild, would be to group up and go into BB,
> destroy everyone they encounter in the hills along the way, and massacre
> everything within BB.
>
> I know many of you would not be willing to give up your already developed
> characters on the splendid server of Zek, nor perhaps if you have one on
> another server, but this was just an idea I had in mind. Hoping one day it
> can come to be...
>
>
> The Redemptor
> Bloodsaber of Qeynos
>
>
>
____________________________________________________________________________
___
>
____________________________________________________________________________
___

an
> alliance between the guild you propose in the east, and Darkenbane, Blood
> Coven, et.al. in the west, would be a force to be reckoned with, indeed.:)
> Should my own guild idea come to be, I'd be more than interested.
>
>
